scripts.build: cp index.html dist/static/index.html && cp deployed-package.json dist/package.json  && ../node_modules/.bin/tsc --p ./tsconfig.json
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run build -- -w" "npm run serve"
scripts.serve: source ../.env && SLACK_CLIENT_ID=$SLACK_CLIENT_ID -e SLACK_VERIFICATION_TOKEN=$SLACK_VERIFICATION_TOKEN -e SLACK_CLIENT_SECRET=$SLACK_CLIENT_SECRET -e MONGO_URL=$MONGO_URL nodemon dist/index.js
